name: Anejo Highball
description: Anejo Highball. [Flickr: teamperks] During the dark, dry years of Prohibition, thousands of thirsty Americans made it a point of vacationing in Cuba. Not only did the island nation offer an alluring Caribbean climate, but Havana was home to...

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rum, curacao, lime juice and bitters in a highball glass. Stir to combine and fill glass with ice; top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wheel and an orange slice.
